prompts.flat_lay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff Coach Cap "Sunset Boy" in Sunset Orange, 100% cotton canvas.

COMPOSITION: Follow the line drawing guide for cap placement. Coach/baseball cap style viewed from above.

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets (ventilation holes on crown, dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver).
- STYLE: Coach cap / baseball cap construction with curved brim.
- PRINT/EMBROIDERY: "Sunset Boy" text/graphic visible (likely on front panel or brim).
- Material: 100% cotton canvas - sturdy, structured cap fabric.
- Adjustable strap or snapback closure at back.

STYLING: Cap laid perfectly flat from top-down view. Brim curved naturally. Crown structure visible.

COLOR: Match the EXACT Sunset Orange from the input image - vibrant, saturated orange. No fading or color shifts.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even, diffused illumination. Show canvas texture and construction details clearly.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop.

High-end fashion e-commerce aesthetic. Clean, minimal presentation.
prompts.eyelet:
Macro detail shot of the ventilation eyelets on Ron Dorff Coach Cap "Sunset Boy" in Sunset Orange, 100% cotton canvas.

CRITICAL DETAILS:
- Two small BLACK metal eyelets (dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver)
- Eyelets are ventilation holes on the crown/top of the cap
- Show the cotton canvas fabric texture surrounding the eyelets
- Cap structure and stitching visible

COMPOSITION: Close-up/macro shot. Show fabric texture and eyelet detail clearly.

COLOR: EXACT Sunset Orange - vibrant, saturated orange.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting. Even illumination to show the black metal finish of the eyelets against the orange canvas.

BACKGROUND: Light gray studio surface.
prompts.print:
Detail shot of the "Sunset Boy" print/embroidery on Ron Dorff Coach Cap "Sunset Boy" in Sunset Orange, 100% cotton canvas.

CRITICAL DETAILS:
- "Sunset Boy" text or graphic clearly visible
- Show the print/embroidery technique (screen print, embroidery, etc.)
- Canvas texture visible
- Clean, legible presentation of the branding

COMPOSITION: Close-up of the print area (likely front panel of cap). Show the design clearly.

COLOR: Match the EXACT Sunset Orange canvas from the input image. Print color should contrast appropriately.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting. Even illumination to show print/embroidery details.

BACKGROUND: Light gray studio surface.
